name: Unity Skirt - Size M/L - BlackLaceTrimming
description:
Details:

- Will fit waist measurement 28"- 35"
- Elastic band on waist
- Skirt Length 19"
- Button atop zipper in the back
- Fully Lined
- Black Lace trimming
- If you need this in a smaller size please include waist measurement

Expected Time of Delivery is between 1-3weeks

For expedited shipping please contact us.

This is our very versatile one-of-a-kind bestseller! Wear it with a blazer or blouse and some sexy heels or even a crop top and sandals. For the fall pair it with bright or neutral pantyhose. Wear it however you like, to wherever you want, like the beach, pool party, on a night out, a wedding and so on. You can dress it up or down.

To see how our clients have worn it check out the "client's in the spotlight" album on: www.facebook.com/EsosaParfaitPage

And feel free to send us your pictures when you wear it EsosaParfait @gmail.com or tag us on instagram/twitter @EsosaParfait #UnitySkirt

-Dry clean only-

name: "Roses" Dress
description:
Can be altered to a US size 2-10.

Only ONE available.

INSTRUCTIONS:
Once you place an order kindly go to "CONTACT" on your left side and send us your "Bust, Waist and Hip measurements" AND US Dress Size. This is very important so we can alter the dress to your measurements.

DETAILS: 
- Length 33"
- Organza-made Rose shoulder design
- Lace covered slits 
- Cotton ankara body

Expected Time of Delivery is between 1-2weeks

NOTE: The dress will be altered EXACTLY to the measurements you give us.

Have a wedding or party to attend? This is your dress. You will surely stand out!
Pair it with nude or black pumps and a lovely clutch and you are good to go.

-Dry clean only-
